channel.title: Should I reboot my YouTube Channel?
channel.description: Are tutorials still something that is needed among the community? What Auxy-related content would you guys like to see? I'm just wondering if I should re-invest time and effort into this thing again.

item.title: Should I reboot my YouTube Channel?
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
One thing that I think would be beneficial to many folks here would be some basic chord theory. I see a lot of stuff where very common / standard progresssions are (over)used, partially because they‚Äôre pleasing to the ear and are therefore popular but I‚Äôd assume also because folks don‚Äôt know how to construct alternative movements. And to be fair, if you don‚Äôt work in chromatic mode much, there isn‚Äôt a real need to learn it.

I was considering putting together a couple tutorials about this (and still am) but would be interested to see your take on this.

Read full topic
